detectors.description:
Receiver.acceptOwnership() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#62-66) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = msg.sender (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#64)

Sale.acceptOwnership() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#182-186) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = msg.sender (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#184)

Sale.changeOwner(address).next (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#177) lacks a zero-check on :
		- newOwner = next (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#178)

Receiver.changeOwner(address).next (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#57) lacks a zero-check on :
		- newOwner = next (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#58)

elements.name: this.balance > softcap && block.timestamp < end && (end - block.timestamp) > SOFTCAP_TIME

detectors.description:
Sale.fallback() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#137-161) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= start) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#140)
	- this.balance > softcap && block.timestamp < end && (end - block.timestamp) > SOFTCAP_TIME (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#144)
	- block.timestamp > end || this.balance > cap (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#153)
detectors.markdown:
[Sale.fallback()](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#L137-L161) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool)(block.timestamp >= start)](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#L140)
	- [this.balance > softcap && block.timestamp < end && (end - block.timestamp) > SOFTCAP_TIME](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#L144)
	- [block.timestamp > end || this.balance > cap](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c138b0cb0e525e90dc7dba271aea046de8481a27_Sale.sol#L153)
